task.title: Manage shared dashboards
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how use the shared dashboard management options.

step.cmd: Go to Analytics > Components > Manage Dashboards.
Under Shared Dashboards, locate the shared dashboard (or legacy dashboard) you want to manage and choose one or more of the following options:

chrow.chdesc: Lets you view the report archive for the shared dashboard, if an archive exists.

Adds a copy to your list of dashboards, using the same name as the original. However, you cannot see any updates/changes made by the dashboard's owner. Copying a legacy dashboard opens a blank dashboard, in which you can add legacy content. If shared users of your dashboard cannot see changes you made in the dashboard, check your Dashboard Manager to see if the users have chosen the Copy Me option. If they did, they cannot see the updates/changes made by you. To see all the changes/updates, shared users need to select the On Menu option in the Dashboard Manager.
Lets you see changes/updates made by the dashboard owner.
Removes the dashboard from your list of shared dashboards.
